overview: One afternoon Dan is brutally jumped and accosted by a Gang in his neighborhood. Angel, the leader of Dans crew demands that he murder his punisher and thus earn his official "membership" into the crew: a teardrop tattoo under his eye.

production_companies.name: Hochschule für Film und Fernsehen 'Konrad Wolf'
Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film München

title: Teardrop
